metadata.title: CVE-2018-19039 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Grafana before 4.6.5 and 5.x before 5.3.3 allows remote authenticated usersto read arbitrary files by leveraging Editor or Admin permissions.

criterions.comment: grafana: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
